channel.title: Need help on how to get gs mini and how to make commands in a server
channel.description: i want gs mini and i also need a way to get there so i need a way to make commands im new to making servers and coding so dont flame or anything

item.title: Need help on how to get gs mini and how to make commands in a server
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

im not going to spend all my time posting a tut on how to get gs mini but making simple tele commands is easy first
search:

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase

then keep searching untill you find a command that looks like this
(you can copy and paste the command below the same command and edit it to make 2 commands =P)

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND NAME HERE")) { if (teleblock == true) { sendMessage("TELE BLOCK MESAGE"); } else { teleportToX = CORDX; teleportToY = CORDY; sendMessage("TELE MESSAGE LINE 1"); sendMessage("TELE MEGAGE LINE 2"); }

replace the command name here with the commands name such as if you put

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("test"))

the command you would type in-game would be ::test
then replace the CORDX AND CORDY with the x and y cords of the location then the messagesâ€¦if you want it ware you can teleport while being tele blocked do this

} else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("COMMAND NAME HERE")) { teleportToX = CORDX; teleportToY = CORDY; sendMessage("TELE MESSAGE LINE 1"); sendMessage("TELE MEGAGE LINE 2"); }
and thare you have it

Read full topic
